fulltext:
Ngô Quang Tuấn Anh
+84 366421234       
tuananhsteven@gmail.com         
District 2, Ho Chi Minh city
Summary 
I am a software engineer, I have spent most of my time to develop iOS apps for 3 years. I 
really love reading and practicing the new iOS technologies to improve my knowledge 
and skills. I also have passions to share my knowledge for everyone in my free time.  
Objectives
The current objectives: Highly energetic and passionate iOS developer seeking working 
opportunities in the iOS application development (with Swift). Interested in improving my 
current programming, communication and teamwork skills to positively contribute to an 
organization’s corporate or departmental objectives.  
The next 3-year objectives: Becoming a project manager. 
Education 
FPT University - Bachelor of Science 
Ho Chi Minh city, Viet Nam - 2013 - 2017 
Major: Software Engineering 
Minor: Information System 
Graduation project: Crowd Monitoring of Exhibition 
Certificate of iOS Programming 
Nhat Nghe Academy, Ho Chi Minh city, Viet Nam - July 2015 
Certificate of Academic Preparation English 
FPT University, Ho Chi Minh city, Viet Nam- September 2014 
References available upon request 
Skills 
Communication Languages: English (fluent), Japanese (beginner) 
Programming Languages: familiar with Swift, Java, HTML, CSS, Javascript. 
Databases & Offline Storage: experienced with SQLite, Core Data framework, Realm 
Development Software: familiar with development tools as: Xcode and Simulator; code 
version control tools as: Git and Bitbucket; GIT GUI as: Source Tree; project management 
tools as: Jira, Confluence and Trello; communication tools: Slack and Skype; other tools: 
Postman, Sketch,… 
Architecture: MVC, MVVM, Singleton, Clean Swift, Functional Reactive Programming 
Technologies: experienced with web services: JSON and XML, Google Vision, Parse, 
Firebase, IOT (bluetooth devices, iBeacon, Arduino, Raspberry, Home Assistant) 
Platforms: technical proficiency in Mac OSX 
iOS 3rd party library : Alamofire, Kingfisher, SVProgressHUD, Firebase Analytics, Realm, 
RxSwift, Texture (AsyncDisplayKit), PromiseKit, Reachability, Facebook SDK, SnapKit, 
CryptoSwift, SkeletonView, IQKeyboardManagerSwift. 
Software Development Methodologies : Agile (Scrum) 
Team work: enjoy working as a team member as well as independently. Using the above 
development software for team work. 
Participate the team building activities like traveling, eating, “nhậu”, “quẩy” bar, karaoke, 
live concert with members in development team and company. 
Experience  
FULLTIME EMPLOYEE 
10/2018 -NOW: IOS DEVELOPER AT CALIFORNIA MANAGEMENT GROUP (CMG.ASIA) 
LEEP App : a fitness social application for all members and PTs of California Fitness & Yoga 
Club. LEEP connects all Cali PTs and their members through Chat, Fitness Calendar and 
News feed. LEEP also allows members to book and buy the personal training sessions with 
their desired PTs. 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/leep-app/id1230805728?mt=8 
12/2017 -9/2018: IOS DEVELOPER AT PERSON PROCESS AND TECHNOLOGY 
FUMA (Atoun Inc): I developed the applications for Person Process and Technology ’s 
customer. The application will control the operations of the oil diffuser, fan and light: turn 
on/off, change mode, set timer, ... I used the Core Bluetooth library for implementing this 
app. 
https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/fuma/id1329618283?l=en&mt=8 (only Japan market) 
Table Top Order: I fixed bugs and developed some features in the current product of 
Persol: Restaurant Ordering System. Some bugs involve with UI, business logic and 
performance of loading data from Internet.  
https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/uレジ-tto/id1260880422?l=en&mt=8 (only Japan market) 
STUDENT 
09/2017 -11/2017: FREELANCER IOS DEVELOPER 
I developed the application for monitoring, analyzing and predicting the lottery result. 
Some technologies and skills I applied for this app: Web-service, Realm, Push Notification, 
Realtime Database with Firebase, Google Vision, Clean Swift Architecture. 
09/2017 -11/2017: GRADUATION PROJECT AT FPT UNIVERSITY: CROWD MONITORING OF EXHIBITION 
I developed the system to collect, analysis user trends at Exposition taking place and 
finished. The system also can notify visitors about the upcoming events. Some 
technologies I applied for this app: Web-service, iBeacons, Push Notification. 
10/2016 -03/2017: PART-TIME IOS DEVELOPER AT  TMA SOLUTIONS 
I developed the applications for TMA customer. 
7/2016 - 9/2016: FREELANCER IOS DEVELOPER 
I developed the application for my customer. This application allows user to view list of 
songs for each category. User can play music, view lyrics and music sheet, download 
songs, add some songs into their wishlist, share with their friend via mail, facebook, … . I 
used the Web-service, Realm and AVFoundation for building this app. 
15/7/2016 - 8/2016: CULTURAL EXCHANGE AT INDIA 
I attended the cultural exchange program between the FPT University and ITM University.  
4/2016 - 6/2016 PART-TIME JOB AT IDE ACADEMY 
Designed and implemented the two applications: 
E-commerce App: The application displays the categories and list of products for each 
category. It also allows users to add products into their wishlist, their shopping cart and 
check out when users want to finish shopping. Users can search their desired products and 
view their order history. This application interacts with RESTful web services basing on 
JSON structure by Alamofire library.  
Chat App: This application allows users to open the chat room (2 person or a group). User 
can send the text, image and emoji messages or their location with their friend. I used the 
realtime database of Firebase for implementing this app. 
I made some youtube videos for guiding the new students of IDE academy. Some topic 
that I have made videos: Alamofire framework, Authentication and Realtime-database with 
the new Firebase, Download File, Parse JSON and XML,… 
7/2015 - 2/2016 SELF-EDUCATION AND UPDATE THE NEW IOS TECHNOLOGY WITH SWIFT AND DO 
SMALL PET PROJECTS: 
Some small pet projects: the iOS application to control lights for my room, the application 
to support learning English words for the TOEFL test and the application to manage 
orders in restaurant. Some technologies I used: Bluetooth 4.0 with arduino nano, SQLite to 
store vocabulary, Web service with JSON. 
2/2015 - 6/2015 PARTICIPATING THE IOS PROGRAMING COURSE AT NHAT NGHE ACADEMY  
Final course project: Built an iOS application to introduce products for a mobile phone 
and computer store. This application allows user to view the news about the latest 
products, view detail all products, search the specific products and display the contact 
information of the store. This application uses web service technology (JSON). 
Publications: 
My Old Blog: https://viblo.asia/u/tuananhsteven. Some topics I have written: iOS 
concurrency with GCD and Operation (9 posts), Class and Struct in Swift - Similarities and 
Differences,… 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
